about_the_game:
In Dirt and Flo you can control one or other of these character wich have their own capacities to resolve puzzle and regain your spaceship.Dirt can move some object and throw a ball of dirt and Flo can glide , blow an allergenic pollen cloud and open the locks wich blocks your progression.

Be careful of the lifeform of this planet ! they all want to beat you or eat you. To avoid that you can use the advantage of your biologic body to hide yourself and get invisible from their eyes !
